[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/setup.c

This handles the setup code for rooms and objects. It simplifies the whole system and makes it nice and generic.

Written by Pinkfish

Started May 16th

Method index

dec_setup()
This method decrements the setup variable.
do_reset()
This method checks to see if the reset is possible.
do_setup()
This method checks to see if the setup is possible.
inc_setup()
This method increments the setup variable.

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

This method checks to see if the reset is possible.
